statements: SELECT * FROM ConflictOfInterest
SELECT review_id, review_status FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE reviewer_id = 1
SELECT conflict_details FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE review_status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM ConflictOfInterest ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT reviewer_id, review_status FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE reviewer_id = 2 AND review_status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_id, review_status FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE review_status = 'pending' ORDER BY reviewer_id ASC;
SELECT review_id, conflict_details FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE reviewer_id = 2 AND review_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE review_status IN ('pending', 'rejected') ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, conflict_details, review_status FROM ConflictOfInterest WHERE reviewer_id = 3 AND review_status != 'approved';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY reviewer_id DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id, conflict_type FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT name, institution FROM reviewers;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT name, institution FROM reviewers WHERE institution = 'University A';
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS conflict_count FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY reviewer_id ORDER BY conflict_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(reviewer_id) AS max_reviewer_id FROM reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE conflict_type = 'financial';
SELECT * FROM reviewers;
SELECT id, name FROM reviewers ORDER BY name;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM papers WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, reviewer_id, paper_id FROM conflicts WHERE conflict_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, email FROM reviewers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM papers WHERE publication_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, reviewer_id, paper_id FROM conflicts WHERE conflict_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY reviewer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM papers WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;

SELECT papers.title, conflicts.conflict_reason, reviewers.email FROM papers JOIN conflicts ON papers.id = conflicts.paper_id JOIN reviewers ON conflicts.reviewer_id = reviewers.id WHERE reviewers.name = 'Alice' OR reviewers.name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewAssignments;
SELECT paper_id, reviewer_id FROM PeerReviewAssignments;
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM PeerReviewAssignments WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, institution FROM Researchers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(score) FROM ReviewerScores GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewAssignments WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE;
SELECT paper_id, reviewer_id FROM PeerReviewAssignments WHERE reviewer_id = '12345';
SELECT name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University X';
SELECT reason FROM ConflictOfInterestReasons WHERE id = '54321';
SELECT paper_id, MAX(score) AS Max_Score FROM ReviewerScores GROUP BY paper_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT institution_name FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(researcher_id) AS max_researcher_id FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT paper_title, researcher_name FROM research_papers JOIN researchers ON research_papers.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT paper_title, review_score FROM reviews JOIN peer_review_assignments ON reviews.assignment_id = peer_review_assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_papers FROM research_papers GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY total_papers DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE researcher_id = 3;
